original: Broberg, Carl Uno Roland, redaktör, fil. mag., Lidköping, f. 12/3/04 i Ar-brå, Gävleb. 1., av fabr. Carl Aug. B. o. Emma Kvarnström. G. 30 m. Linnea Samuelsson. Barn: Torbjörn f. 31, Anita 34, Hans 36. — Stud:ex. i Söderhamn 22, fil. kand. i Upps. 27, fil. mag. där 29, stud. v. hand:högsk. i Berlin 22-23. Res. t. Finl. 38, Danm. 47. Distrxhef f. Livförsäkr. A-B Bal-der i Hudiksvall 29-37, red:sekr. i Hu-diksv. Nyh. 37-42, red. f. Nya Lidköp.-Tidn. sed. 43. Landstingsman sed. 47, led. av stadsfullm. fr. 47, av folksk:-styr. fr. 46, av samrealsk. lokistyr. fr. 46, ordf. i Samrealsk. föräldrafören. sed. 45, i fp i Lidköp. sed. 45, sekr. i fören. Nordens lok:avd. sed. 47. Hobby: musik.
translated:
Broberg, Carl Uno Roland, editor, Master of Arts, Lidköping, born on March 12, 1904 in Arboga, Gävleborg County, son of factory owner Carl Aug. B. and Emma Kvarnström. Married to Linnea Samuelsson in 1930. They have three children: Torbjörn, born in 1931, Anita, born in 1934, and Hans, born in 1936. 

Broberg graduated from Söderhamn high school in 1922, received a Bachelor of Arts degree from Uppsala University in 1927, and a Master of Arts degree there in 1929. He studied at the university of commerce in Berlin from 1922-1923. He traveled to Finland in 1938 and to Denmark in 1947. 

Broberg was district head of the insurance company Livförsäkring A-B Balder in Hudiksvall from 1929-1937, secretary of the Hudiksvalls Nyheter newspaper from 1937-1942, and editor of the Nya Lidköpings-Tidningen newspaper since 1943. He has been a member of the county council since 1947, a member of the city council since 1947, a member of the school board since 1946, a chairman of the parents' association for the Samrealskola since 1945, a member of the Liberal Party in Lidköping since 1945, and secretary of the Nordic association's local chapter since 1947.

In his spare time, Broberg enjoys music.

memberOf.name: The Parents' Association for the Samrealskola
